name: Temporary Tool
shortDesc: You conjure a temporary simple tool, such as a shovel or rope into your hands.
PFSnote: The temporary tool spell can be used to create only simple tools, and therefore cannot create kits, which are complex objects made of multiple pieces, or objects made of any specific precious material.
duration: until used or 1 minute; see text
desc: You conjure a temporary simple tool, such as a shovel or rope into your hands. It lasts until it is used for a single activity or for 1 minute, whichever comes first, after which it disappears. The tool is obviously temporarily conjured, and thus cant be sold or passed off as a genuine item.

name: Tether
shortDesc: You use magical chains, vines, or other tethers to bind your target to you.
duration: 1 minute or until dismissed; see text
desc: You use magical chains, vines, or other tethers to bind your target to you. The creature can still try to Escape, and it or others can break the tethers by attacking them (the tethers have AC <var>var1</var> and <var>var2</var> Hit Points). You must stay within 30 feet of the target while it is tethered; moving more than 30 feet away from your target ends the spell. The target must attempt a Reflex save.
success: The target takes a -5-foot circumstance penalty to its Speed as long as it is within 30 feet of you.
failure: The target takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speed and cannot move more than 30 feet away from you until it Escapes or the spell ends.
critfailure: The target is immobilized until it Escapes or the spell ends.

heightened.desc: The tethers AC increases by 3 and their Hit Points increase by 10.

name: True Strike
shortDesc: Make your next attack especially accurate.
duration: until the end of your turn
desc: A glimpse into the future ensures your next blow strikes true. The next time you make an attack roll before the end of your turn, roll the attack twice and use the better result. The attack ignores circumstance penalties to the attack roll and any flat check required due to the target being concealed or hidden.

name: Unseen Servant
shortDesc: Create an invisible creature to help you.
desc: You summon an unseen servant (Core Rulebook pg. 380), which you can command as part of Sustaining the Spell. It serves you until its Hit Points are reduced to 0, at which point the spell ends, or until you stop Sustaining the Spell. The unseen servant gains the summoned trait.

name: Ventriloquism
shortDesc: Throw your voice.
desc: Whenever you speak or make any other sound vocally, you can make your vocalization seem to originate from somewhere else within 60 feet, and you can change that apparent location freely as you vocalize. <var>var1</var>

heightened.desc: The spell's duration increases to 1 hour, and you can also change the tone, quality, and other aspects of your voice. Before a creature can attempt to disbelieve your illusion, it must actively attempt a Perception check or otherwise use actions to interact with the sound.

desc1.value: Any creature that hears the sound can attempt to disbelieve your illusion.

desc2.value: The spell's duration increases to 1 hour, and you can also change the tone, quality, and other aspects of your voice. Before a creature can attempt to disbelieve your illusion, it must actively attempt a Perception check or otherwise use actions to interact with the sound.

name: Verdant Sprout
shortDesc: You imbue a single ordinary, inexpensive plant seed with primal energy and throw it onto a surface, where it gradually sprouts into a Medium plant.
sourceBook: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On
desc: You imbue a single ordinary, inexpensive plant seed with primal energy and throw it onto a surface, where it gradually sprouts into a Medium plant. After 10 minutes, the plant is sturdy enough to provide standard cover, and its space is difficult terrain. The plant is laden with nutritious nuts or fruit sufficient to feed one Medium creature for a day. The plant has AC 10, Hardness 5, and 20 Hit Points. <var>var1</var>

heightened.desc: You throw an additional seed, which grows into an additional plant within range.

desc2.value: You can throw an additional seed, which grows into an additional plant within range.

desc3.value: You can throw two additional seeds, which grow into additional plants within range.

desc4.value: You can throw three additional seeds, which grow into additional plants within range.

desc5.value: You can throw four additional seeds, which grow into additional plants within range.

desc6.value: You can throw five additional seeds, which grow into additional plants within range.

desc7.value: You can throw six additional seeds, which grow into additional plants within range.

desc8.value: You can throw seven additional seeds, which grow into additional plants within range.

desc9.value: You can throw eight additional seeds, which grow into additional plants within range.

desc10.value: You can throw nine additional seeds, which grow into additional plants within range.

name: Acid Arrow
shortDesc: Magical arrow deals acid damage persistently.

name: Animal Form
shortDesc: Turn into a dangerous animal.

name: Animal Messenger
shortDesc: Send a Tiny animal to deliver a message.

name: Animus Mine
shortDesc: You implant a mental mine within your psyche that detonates against anyone attempting to manipulate your thoughts.

name: Augury
shortDesc: Predict whether a course of action brings good fortune.

name: Barkskin
shortDesc: Target's skin is covered in protective bark.
desc: The target's skin becomes covered in bark. The target gains resistance <var>var1</var> to bludgeoning and piercing damage and weakness <var>var2</var> to fire. After the target takes fire damage, it can Dismiss the spell as a free action triggered by taking the damage; doing so doesn't reduce the fire damage the target was dealt.

heightened.desc: The resistances increase by 2, and the weakness increases by 3.

name: Blur
shortDesc: Cause a target's form to become blurry and hard to hit.
desc: The target's form appears blurry. It becomes concealed. As the nature of this effect still leaves the target's location obvious, the target can't use this concealment to Hide or Sneak.

name: Brand the Impenitent
shortDesc: You brand the target with an ethereal copy of your deity's religious symbol.

name: Calm Emotions
shortDesc: Suppress strong emotions and hostility.

name: Comprehend Language
shortDesc: A creature understands one language.

name: Continual Flame
shortDesc: A magical flame burns indefinitely.

name: Create Food
shortDesc: Conjure food that can feed multiple creatures.
desc: You create enough food to feed <var>var1</var> Medium creatures for a day. This food is bland and unappealing, but it is nourishing. After 1 day, if no one has eaten the food, it decays and becomes inedible. Most Small creatures eat one-quarter as much as a Medium creature (one-sixteenth as much for most Tiny creatures), and most Large creatures eat 10 times as much (100 times as much for Huge creatures and so on).

heightened.desc: You can feed 12 Medium creatures.
You can feed 50 Medium creatures.
You can feed 200 Medium creatures.
You can feed 200 Medium creatures.

name: Darkness
shortDesc: Suppress all light in an area.

name: Darkvision
shortDesc: See in the dark.

name: Deafness
shortDesc: Make a creature deaf.

name: Death Knell
shortDesc: Finish off a creature who's near death.

name: Dispel Magic
shortDesc: End a spell or suppress an item's magic.
targets: 1 spell effect or unattended magic item
desc: You unravel the magic behind a spell or effect. Attempt a counteract check against the target. If you succeed against a spell effect, you counteract it. If you succeed against a magic item, the item becomes a mundane item of its type for 10 minutes. This doesn't change the item's non-magical properties. If the target is an artifact or similar item, you automatically fail.

name: Endure Elements
shortDesc: Protect a creature from severe cold or heat.

name: Enhance Victuals
shortDesc: Improve food or drink and remove poisons.

name: Enlarge
shortDesc: A creature grows in size.
desc: <var>var1</var>Bolstered by magical power, the target grows to size <var>var2</var>. Its equipment grows with it but returns to natural size if removed. The creature is clumsy 1. Its reach increases by <var>var3</var>, and it gains a <var>var4</var>. This spell has no effect on a <var>var5</var> or larger creature.

heightened.desc: The creature instead grows to size Huge. The status bonus to melee damage is +4 and the creature's reach increases by 10 feet (or 15 feet if the creature started out Tiny). The spell has no effect on a Huge or larger creature.
Choose either the 2nd-level or 4th-level version of this spell and apply its effects to 10 willing creatures.

desc2.value: 5 feet (or by 10 feet if it started out Tiny)

desc4.value: 10 feet (or 15 feet if the creature started out Tiny)

desc6.value: Choose either the 2nd-level or 4th-level version of this spell and apply its effects to 10 willing creatures.
5 feet (or by 10 feet if it started out Tiny) / 10 feet on 4th level (or 15 feet if it started out Tiny)
+2 status bonus to melee damage (+4 on 4th level)

name: Entangle
shortDesc: Plants in an area grow to entangle and immobilize.

name: Expeditious Excavation
shortDesc: You remove loose dirt, dust, gravel, sand, and the like from the area.

name: Faerie Fire
shortDesc: Colorful light prevents creatures from being concealed or invisible.

name: False Life
shortDesc: Gain temporary HP.

name: Feast of Ashes
shortDesc: You curse the target with a hunger no food can sate.

name: Flaming Sphere
shortDesc: A ball of fire rolls about at your command.

name: Fungal Hyphae
shortDesc: Thin hyphae grow from your feet and plunge into the earth.

name: Gentle Repose
shortDesc: A corpse doesn't decay and can't become undead.

name: Ghoulish Cravings
shortDesc: Infect a creature with ghoul fever.

name: Glitterdust
shortDesc: Sparkling dust breaks invisibility and impedes vision.

name: Hideous Laughter
shortDesc: Fits of laughter make a creature unable to take all its actions.

name: Humanoid Form
shortDesc: Take the shape of a humanoid.

name: Illusory Creature
shortDesc: Form a convincing illusion of a creature.

name: Invisibility
shortDesc: A creature can't be seen until it attacks.
desc: Cloaked in illusion, the target becomes invisible. This makes it undetected to all creatures, though the creatures can attempt to find the target, making it hidden to them instead. <var>var1</var>

heightened.desc: The spell lasts 1 minute, but it doesn't end if the target uses a hostile action.

desc2.value: If the target uses a hostile action, the spell ends after that hostile action is completed.

desc4.value: The spell lasts 1 minute, but it doesn't end if the target uses a hostile action.

name: Iron Gut
shortDesc: Your mouth, esophagus, and stomach become incredibly elastic and tougher than metal.

name: Knock
shortDesc: Make a door, lock, or container easier to open, and possibly open it immediately.
desc:
You make the target easier to open. Knock grants a +4 status bonus to any creature that tries to open the target door, lock, or container with an Athletics or a Thievery check. You can attempt a Thievery check to open the target as part of casting knock, and you add your level even if you're untrained.

Knock counteracts lock.

name: Magic Mouth
shortDesc: Make an illusory mouth appear to speak a message.

name: Mirror Image
shortDesc: Illusory duplicates of you cause attacks to miss.
desc:
Three illusory images of you swirl about your space, potentially causing those who attack you to hit one of the images instead of you. Any attack that would hit you has a random chance of hitting one of your images instead of you. If all three images remain, there is a 1 in 4 chance of hitting you (1 on 1d4). With two images remaining, there is a 1 in 3 chance of hitting you (1-2 on 1d6). With only one image, the chances are 1 in 2 (1-3 on 1d6).

Once an image is hit, it is destroyed. If an attack roll fails to hit your AC but doesn't critically fail, it destroys an image but has no additional effect (even if the attack would normally have an effect on a failure). If an attack roll is a critical success and would hit one of the images, one of the images is destroyed and the attack roll becomes a success against you. Once all the images are destroyed, the spell ends.

name: Misdirection
shortDesc: Cause one creature's auras to appear to be another's.

name: Obscuring Mist
shortDesc: Conceal creatures in a cloud of mist.

name: Paranoia
shortDesc: Make a creature believe everyone is a threat.

name: Phantom Steed
shortDesc: Conjure a magical horse.

name: Remove Fear
shortDesc: Free a creature from its fright.

name: Remove Paralysis
shortDesc: Free a creature from paralysis.
desc: <var>var1</var>A surge of energy frees a paralyzed creature. You can attempt to counteract a single effect imposing the paralyzed condition on the target. This does not cure someone who is paralyzed from some natural state or effect, such as paralysis caused by non-magical wounds or toxins.

heightened.desc: The spell's range increases to 30 feet, and you can target up to 10 creatures.

desc6.value: The spell's range increases to 30 feet, and you can target up to 10 creatures.

name: Resist Energy
shortDesc: Protect a creature from one type of energy damage.

name: Restoration
shortDesc: Reduce a condition or lessen a toxin.

name: Restore Senses
shortDesc: Remove a blinding or deafening effect.

name: See Invisibility
shortDesc: See invisible creatures and objects.

name: Shape Wood
shortDesc: Reshape unworked wood as you choose.

name: Shatter
shortDesc: Shatter an object with a high-frequency sonic attack.

name: Shield Other
shortDesc: Absorb half the damage an ally would take.

name: Shrink
shortDesc: Reduce a willing creature to Tiny size.
desc: <var>var1</var>You warp space to make a creature smaller. The target shrinks to become Tiny in size. Its equipment shrinks with it but returns to its original size if removed. The creature's reach changes to 0 feet. This spell has no effect on a Tiny creature.

heightened.desc: The spell can target up to 10 creatures.

desc6.value: The spell can target up to 10 creatures.

name: Silence
shortDesc: Mute all sound from a creature.

name: Slough Skin
shortDesc: You continually and harmlessly slough off the top layer of your skin while new skin regenerates immediately.

name: Sound Burst
shortDesc: Damage and deafen creatures with a powerful din.

name: Speak with Animals
shortDesc: Communicate with animals.
desc: You can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use the Diplomacy skill with animals. The spell doesn't make them more friendly than normal. Cunning animals are likely to be terse and evasive, while less intelligent ones often make inane comments.

name: Spectral Hand
shortDesc: Create a semicorporeal hand that touches creatures to target them with your spells.

name: Spider Climb
shortDesc: Give a creature a climb Speed.

name: Spiritual Weapon
shortDesc: Materialize a deific weapon of force that appears and attacks repeatedly.

name: Status
shortDesc: Keep track of a willing creature's location and well-being.

name: Summon Elemental
shortDesc: Conjure an elemental to fight on your behalf.

name: Telekinetic Maneuver
shortDesc: Disarm, Shove, or Trip a creature telekinetically.

name: Touch of Idiocy
shortDesc: Dull a target's mind with a touch.

name: Tree Shape
shortDesc: Turn into a tree.

name: Undetectable Alignment
shortDesc: Make a creature or object appear neutral to alignment detection.

name: Water Breathing
shortDesc: Allow creatures to breathe underwater.
desc: <var>var1</var>The targets can breathe underwater.

heightened.desc: The duration increases to 8 hours.
The duration increases to until your next daily preparations.

desc4.value: The duration increases to until your next daily preparations.

name: Water Walk
shortDesc: Buoy a creature so it can walk on water.

name: Web
shortDesc: Form a web that keeps creatures from moving.

name: Animal Vision
shortDesc: Project your senses through an animal.

name: Bind Undead
shortDesc: Take control of a mindless undead.

name: Blindness
shortDesc: Strike a target blind.

name: Chilling Darkness
shortDesc: Ray of evil darkness deals cold damage, counteracts light, and harms celestials.

name: Circle of Protection
shortDesc: A creature emits an aura that protects those within against an alignment.

name: Clairaudience
shortDesc: Hear through an invisible magical sensor.

name: Crisis of Faith
shortDesc: Cause mental damage and possibly make a worshipper unable to cast spells.

name: Cup of Dust
shortDesc: You curse the target with a thirst no drink can quench.

name: Dream Message
shortDesc: Send a message that arrives in a dream.

name: Earthbind
shortDesc: Bring a flying creature to the ground.

name: Enthrall
shortDesc: Your speech makes creatures fascinated with you.

name: Feet to Fins
shortDesc: Turn a creature's feet into fins, enabling it swim but slowing it on land.

name: Fireball
shortDesc: An explosion of fire in an area burns creatures.
desc: A roaring blast of fire appears at a spot you designate, dealing <var>var1</var> fire damage.

heightened.desc: The damage increases by 2d6.

name: Ghostly Weapon
shortDesc: Make a weapon affect incorporeal creatures.

name: Glyph of Warding
shortDesc: Store a spell in a symbol to make a trap.

name: Gravity Well
shortDesc: You create a sphere of altered gravity.

name: Haste
shortDesc: Speed up a creature so it can attack or move more often.
desc: <var>var1</var>Magic empowers the target to act faster. It gains the quickened condition and can use the extra action each round only for Strike and Stride actions.

heightened.desc: You can target up to 6 creatures.

desc7.value: You can target up to 6 creatures.

name: Heroism
shortDesc: Stoke a creature's inner heroism to make it more competent.

name: Hypercognition
shortDesc: Recall massive amounts of information in an instant.

name: Hypnotic Pattern
shortDesc: Shifting colors dazzle and fascinate creatures.

name: Insect Form
shortDesc: Turn into a dangerous giant insect.

name: Invisibility Sphere
shortDesc: You and creatures near you become invisible as you explore.
targets: you and any number of creatures in range
desc:
<var>var1</var>You and all targets are invisible except to each other as long as you remain within the spell's area. If a creature made invisible by this spell leaves the spell's area, it becomes visible and remains so even if it returns to the spell's area. If any creature made invisible by this spell uses a hostile action, the spell ends after the hostile action is completed.

While exploring, it's easy to move together slowly and remain invisible. This is untenable in a battle, however. Once an encounter begins, creatures remain invisible until at most the end of the first round, at which point the spell ends.

heightened.desc: The duration increases to 1 hour.

name: Levitate
shortDesc: Float an object or creature a few feet of the ground.
desc: You defy gravity and levitate the target 5 feet off the ground. For the duration of the spell, you can move the target up or down 10 feet with a single action, which has the concentrate trait. A creature floating in the air from levitate takes a -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls. A floating creature can spend an Interact action to stabilize itself and negate this penalty for the remainder of its turn. If the target is adjacent to a fixed object or terrain of suitable stability, it can move across the surface by climbing (if the surface is vertical, like a wall) or crawling (if the surface is horizontal, such as a ceiling). The GM determines which surfaces can be climbed or crawled across.

name: Lightning Bolt
shortDesc: Lightning strikes all creatures in a line.

name: Locate
shortDesc: Learn the direction to an object.

name: Meld Into Stone
shortDesc: Meld into a block of stone.

name: Mind Reading
shortDesc: Read a creature's surface thoughts.

name: Neutralize Poison
shortDesc: Cure a poison afflicting a creature.

name: Nondetection
shortDesc: Protect a creature or object from detection.

name: Paralyze
shortDesc: Freeze a humanoid in place.
desc: <var>var1</var>You block the target's motor impulses before they can leave its mind, threatening to freeze the target in place. The target must attempt a Will save.
failure: The target is paralyzed for 1 round.
critfailure: The target is paralyzed for 4 rounds. At the end of each of its turns, it can attempt a new Will save to reduce the remaining duration by 1 round, or end it entirely on a critical success.

heightened.desc: You can target up to 10 creatures.

desc7.value: You can target up to 10 creatures.

name: Remove Disease
shortDesc: Cure a disease afflicting a creature.

name: Sanctified Ground
shortDesc: Create a 24-hour area of protection against aberrations, celestials, dragons, fiends, or undead.

name: Searing Light
shortDesc: A ray of burning light deals extra damage to undead and counteracts darkness.
desc:
You shoot a blazing ray of light tinged with holy energy. Make a ranged spell attack. The ray deals <var>var1</var> fire damage. If the target is a fiend or undead, you deal an extra <var>var2</var> good damage.

If the light passes through an area of magical darkness or targets a creature affected by magical darkness, searing light attempts to counteract the darkness. If you need to determine whether the light passes through an area of darkness, draw a line between yourself and the spell's target.
critsuccess: The target takes double fire damage, as well as double good damage if a fiend or undead.

heightened.desc: The fire damage increases by 2d6, and the good damage against fiends and undead increases by 2d6.

name: Secret Page
shortDesc: Alter the appearance of a page.

name: Shifting Sand
shortDesc: You cause the surface to heave.

name: Show the Way
shortDesc: You and affected allies gain preternatural knowledge of the path ahead, allowing you to intuit the best way forward and avoid potential obstacles.

name: Shrink Item
shortDesc: Reduce an object to the size of a coin.

name: Slow
shortDesc: Make a creature slower, reducing its actions.

name: Stinking Cloud
shortDesc: Form a cloud that sickens creatures.

name: Vampiric Touch
shortDesc: Deal negative damage and gain temporary HP with a touch.

name: Wall of Thorns
shortDesc: Grow a wall of brambles.

name: Wall of Wind
shortDesc: Create a wall of gusting winds that hinders movement and ranged attacks.

name: Wanderer's Guide
shortDesc: Find an ideal route to a location.

name: Whirling Scarves
shortDesc: You surround yourself in a vortex of whirling colorful scarves of force that obfuscate you and disorient your foes.

name: Zone of Truth
shortDesc: Designate an area where creatures are compelled to be truthful.

name: Aerial Form
shortDesc: Turn into a flying combatant.

name: Air Walk
shortDesc: Walk on air as though it were solid ground.

name: Anathematic Reprisal
shortDesc: Cause mental pain to one who commits anathema against your deity.

name: Blink
shortDesc: Flit between the planes, vanishing and reappearing.

name: Clairvoyance
shortDesc: See through an invisible magical sensor.

name: Confusion
shortDesc: Befuddle a creature, making it act randomly.

name: Creation
shortDesc: Make a temporary object.
desc: You conjure a temporary object from eldritch energy. <var>var1</var> It can't rely on intricate artistry or complex moving parts, never fulfills a cost or the like, and can't be made of precious materials or materials with a rarity of uncommon or higher. It is obviously temporarily conjured, and thus can't be sold or passed off as a genuine item.

heightened.desc: The item is metal and can include common minerals, like feldspar or quartz.

desc4.value: It must be of vegetable matter (such as wood or paper) and 5 cubic feet or smaller.

desc5.value: The item is metal and can include common minerals, like feldspar or quartz. It must be 5 cubic feet or smaller.

name: Detect Scrying
shortDesc: Find out if scrying effects are in the area.

name: Dimension Door
shortDesc: Teleport yourself up to 120 feet.
desc: <var>var1</var>Opening a door that bypasses normal space, you instantly transport yourself and any items you're wearing and holding from your current space to a clear space within range you can see. <var>var2</var>If this would bring another creature with youeven if you're carrying it in an extradimensional containerthe spell is lost. <var>var3</var>

heightened.desc: The range increases to 1 mile. You don't need to be able to see your destination, as long as you have been there in the past and know its relative location and distance from you. You are temporarily immune for 1 hour.

desc5.value: You don't need to be able to see your destination, as long as you have been there in the past and know its relative location and distance from you.
You are temporarily immune for 1 hour.

name: Dimensional Anchor
shortDesc: Keep a creature from teleporting or traveling to other planes.

name: Dinosaur Form
shortDesc: Turn into a dinosaur.

name: Discern Lies
shortDesc: Expertly detect lies and falsehoods.

name: Divine Wrath
shortDesc: Damage and hinder creatures of alignments opposed by your deity.

name: Fire Shield
shortDesc: Flames protect you from cold and harm those that touch you.

name: Fly
shortDesc: Cause the target creature to gain a fly Speed.
desc: <var>var1</var>The target can soar through the air, gaining a fly Speed equal to its Speed or 20 feet, whichever is greater.

heightened.desc: The duration increases to 1 hour.

name: Freedom of Movement
shortDesc: A creature overcomes hindrances to its movement.

name: Gaseous Form
shortDesc: Turn a willing creature into a flying cloud.

name: Glibness
shortDesc: Lie with impunity.

name: Globe of Invulnerability
shortDesc: Magical sphere counteracts spells that would enter it.

name: Hallucinatory Terrain
shortDesc: A natural environment appears to be another kind of terrain.

name: Holy Cascade
shortDesc: Turn a vial of holy water into an explosion of blessed water.

name: Hydraulic Torrent
shortDesc: Force creatures back with a damaging line of water.

name: Modify Memory
shortDesc: Change or implant memories.

name: Nightmare
shortDesc: Plague a creature's dreams with disturbing nightmares.

name: Outcast's Curse
shortDesc: Curse a creature to be off-putting and grating.

name: Phantasmal Killer
shortDesc: Place a fearsome image in a creature's mind to scare and possibly kill it.

name: Private Sanctum
shortDesc: Black fog prevents sensing, scrying, and mind-reading on anyone within.

name: Read Omens
shortDesc: Get a piece of advice about an upcoming event.

name: Reflective Scales
shortDesc: You grow a set of colored glowing scales or scaled armor that stores energy before releasing it in a final burst.

name: Remove Curse
shortDesc: Counteract a curse afflicting a creature.

name: Resilient Sphere
shortDesc: Create a sphere of force that blocks anything that would come through.

name: Rope Trick
shortDesc: Animate a rope that rises to an extradimensional hiding place.

name: Shape Stone
shortDesc: Reshape a cube of stone.
targets: cube of stone 10 feet across or smaller
desc: You shape the stone into a rough shape of your choice. The shaping process is too crude to produce intricate parts, fine details, moving pieces, or the like. Any creatures standing atop the stone when you reshape it must each attempt a Reflex save or Acrobatics check.
failure: The creature falls prone atop the stone.
critfailure: The creature falls off the stone (if applicable) and lands prone.

name: Solid Fog
shortDesc: Conjure heavy fog that obscures sight and is hard to move through.

name: Speak with Plants
shortDesc: Communicate with plants and plant creatures.

name: Spell Immunity
shortDesc: Name a spell to negate its effects on you.

name: Stoneskin
shortDesc: Harden a creature's skin into durable stone.

name: Suggestion
shortDesc: Suggest a course of action a creature must follow.

name: Talking Corpse
shortDesc: Have a corpse answer three questions.

name: Telepathy
shortDesc: Communicate telepathically with any creatures near you.

name: Veil
shortDesc: Disguise many creatures as other creatures.

name: Vital Beacon
shortDesc: Radiate vitality that heals creatures that touch you.

name: Wall of Fire
shortDesc: Create a blazing wall burns creatures that pass through.
desc: You raise a blazing wall that burns creatures passing through it. You create either a 5-foot-thick wall of flame in a straight line up to 60 feet long and 10 feet high, or a 5-foot-thick, 10-foot-radius ring of flame with the same height. The wall stands vertically in either form; if you wish, the wall can be of a shorter length or height. Everything on each side of the wall is concealed from creatures on the opposite side. Any creature that crosses the wall or is occupying the wall's area at the start of its turn takes <var>var1</var> fire damage.

heightened.desc: The fire damage increases by 1d6.

name: Weapon Storm
shortDesc: Multiply a weapon you hold and attack many creatures with it.

name: Abyssal Plague
shortDesc: Inflict a draining curse.

name: Acid Storm
shortDesc: You evoke a storm of acid rain that pelts the area for the spell's duration.

name: Banishment
shortDesc: Send a creature back to its home plane.

name: Black Tentacles
shortDesc: Tentacles in an area grab creatures.

name: Breath of Life
shortDesc: React to revive a creature at the moment of its death.

name: Chromatic Wall
shortDesc: A wall of light offers a unique protection based on its color.

name: Cloak of Colors
shortDesc: Bright colors dazzle creatures near the target, and attacks cause blinding flashes of light.

name: Cloudkill
shortDesc: Poison creatures in a cloud that moves away from you.

name: Cone of Cold
shortDesc: Bitter cold damages creatures in a cone.

name: Control Water
shortDesc: Raise or lower water in a large area.

name: Crushing Despair
shortDesc: Make a creature sob uncontrollably.

name: Death Ward
shortDesc: Protect a creature against negative energy.

name: Dreaming Potential
shortDesc: The target retrains in its dreams.

name: Drop Dead
shortDesc: The target appears to die but actually turns invisible.

name: Elemental Form
shortDesc: Turn into an elemental.

name: False Vision
shortDesc: Trick a scrying spell.

name: Flame Strike
shortDesc: Call divine fire from the sky.

name: Hallucination
shortDesc: A creature believes one thing is another, can't detect something, or sees something that's not really there.

name: Illusory Scene
shortDesc: Create an imaginary scene containing multiple creatures and objects.

name: Mariner's Curse
shortDesc: Infect a creature with the curse of the rolling sea.

name: Mind Probe
shortDesc: Uncover knowledge and memories in a creature's mind.

name: Moon Frenzy
shortDesc: Give willing creatures fangs and claws, and send them into a frenzy.

name: Passwall
shortDesc: Form an earthen tunnel through a wall.

name: Plant Form
shortDesc: Turn into a dangerous plant creature.

name: Prying Eye
shortDesc: An invisible eye transmits what it sees to you.

name: Sending
shortDesc: Send a mental message to a creature anywhere on the planet and get a reply.

name: Shadow Blast
shortDesc: Shape a cone of shadow to deal damage of a type you choose.

name: Shadow Siphon
shortDesc: React to lessen the damage from an enemy's spell by making it partially illusion.

name: Shadow Walk
shortDesc: Travel rapidly via the Shadow Plane.

name: Spiritual Guardian
shortDesc: Create a magical guardian to attack at your command and take damage for your allies.

name: Subconscious Suggestion
shortDesc: Plant a mental suggestion that must be followed when a trigger occurs.

name: Summon Celestial
shortDesc: Conjure a celestial to fight on your behalf.

name: Summon Dragon
shortDesc: Conjure a dragon to fight on your behalf.

name: Summon Entity
shortDesc: Conjure an aberration to fight on your behalf.

name: Summon Fiend
shortDesc: Conjure a fiend to fight on your behalf.

name: Summon Giant
shortDesc: Conjure a giant to fight on your behalf.

name: Synaptic Pulse
shortDesc: Slow creatures with a mental blast.

name: Synesthesia
shortDesc: Rewire a creature's senses.

name: Telekinetic Haul
shortDesc: Move a large object.

name: Telepathic Bond
shortDesc: Link minds with willing creatures to communicate telepathically at great distances.

name: Tongues
shortDesc: Let a creature understand and speak all languages.

name: Tree Stride
shortDesc: Teleport from tree to tree.

name: Wall of Ice
shortDesc: Sculpt a foot-thick wall of ice that blocks sight and can chill creatures.

name: Wall of Stone
shortDesc: Shape a wall of stone.

name: Baleful Polymorph
shortDesc: Transform a creature into a harmless animal.

name: Blade Barrier
shortDesc: Form a wall of swords made of force.

name: Chain Lightning
shortDesc: Lightning jumps from creature to creature.

name: Collective Transposition
shortDesc: Teleport up to two creatures to new positions near you.

name: Disintegrate
shortDesc: Reduce a creature or object to dust.

name: Dominate
shortDesc: A humanoid must obey your orders.

name: Dragon Form
shortDesc: Turn into a dragon.

name: Feeblemind
shortDesc: Stupefy a creature permanently.

name: Field of Life
shortDesc: Create a positive energy field that heals those within.

name: Fire Seeds
shortDesc: Make four explosive acorns.

name: Flesh to Stone
shortDesc: Turn a living creature into a stone statue.

name: Mislead
shortDesc: Turn invisible and create a duplicate of yourself who acts like you.

name: Phantasmal Calamity
shortDesc: Damage a creature mentally with visions of an apocalypse.

name: Purple Worm Sting
shortDesc: Damage a creature and infect it with purple worm venom.

name: Raise Dead
shortDesc: Return a dead creature to life.

name: Repulsion
shortDesc: Prevent creatures from approaching you.

name: Righteous Might
shortDesc: Turn into a battle form with divine armaments.

name: Scrying
shortDesc: Spy on a creature.

name: Spellwrack
shortDesc: Curse a creature to be harmed when a spell is cast on it and lower the duration of its spells.

name: Spirit Blast
shortDesc: Damage a creature's spiritual essence.

name: Stone Tell
shortDesc: Speak to spirits within natural stone.

name: Stone to Flesh
shortDesc: Turn a creature turned to stone back to flesh.
targets: petrified creature or human-size stone object
desc: Manipulating the fundamental particles of matter, you convert stone into flesh and blood. You restore a petrified creature to its normal state or transform a stone object into a mass of inert flesh (without stone's Hardness) in roughly the same shape.

name: Tangling Creepers
shortDesc: Entangle creatures in a burst and concentrate to lash out with immobilizing vines.

name: Teleport
shortDesc: Transport you and willing creatures a great distance.

name: True Seeing
shortDesc: See through illusions and transmutations.
desc: You see things within 60 feet as they actually are. The GM rolls a secret counteract check against any illusion or transmutation in the area, but only for the purpose of determining whether you see through it (for instance, if the check succeeds against a polymorph spell, you can see the creature's true form, but you don't end the polymorph spell).

name: Vampiric Exsanguination
shortDesc: Draw blood and life force from creatures in a cone.

name: Vibrant Pattern
shortDesc: Make a pattern of lights that dazzles and blinds.

name: Wall of Force
shortDesc: Create an invisible and durable wall of magical force.

name: Zealous Conviction
shortDesc: Instill unshakable conviction and zeal in willing creatures.

name: Contingency
shortDesc: Set up a spell to trigger later under your choice of circumstances.

name: Dimensional Lock
shortDesc: Prevent teleportation and planar travel.

name: Divine Decree
shortDesc: Creatures of alignments opposed by your deity are damaged, enfeebled, paralyzed, or banished.

name: Divine Vessel
shortDesc: Take on aspects of a servitor of your deity.

name: Duplicate Foe
shortDesc: Create a temporary duplicate of an enemy that fights for you.

name: Eclipse Burst
shortDesc: A globe of darkness deals cold damage, hurts the living, and overcomes light.

name: Energy Aegis
shortDesc: A creature gains resistance to acid, cold, electricity, fire, force, and sonic.

name: Ethereal Jaunt
shortDesc: Use the Ethereal Plane to move through objects and into the air.
desc:
<var>var1</var>You travel to the Ethereal Plane, which overlaps the Material Plane. Material Plane creatures can't see you, and you can move through things on the Material Plane. You move at half your normal Speeds, but can move in any direction (including up and down).

You can see onto the Material Plane within a radius of 60 feet; it is gray, hazy, and concealed from you. You can't affect the Material Plane, and you can't be affected by the Material Plane except by force effects and abjurations originating there.

When the spell ends, you return to the Material Plane. If you're in the air, you fall (unless you can fly), and if you're inside an object, you're pushed into the nearest open space and take 1d6 damage per 5 feet you were pushed.

If you cast this spell when not on the Material Plane, it is lost.

heightened.desc: You can target up to five additional willing creatures at a range of 30 feet. The duration is up to 10 minutes.

desc9.value: You can target up to five additional willing creatures at a range of 30 feet. The duration is up to 10 minutes.

name: Fiery Body
shortDesc: Turn your body into living flame.

name: Finger of Death
shortDesc: Point at a creature to deal negative damage and possibly kill it instantly.

name: Magnificent Mansion
shortDesc: Conjure a secure dwelling in a demiplane.

name: Mask of Terror
shortDesc: A creature's fearsome illusory appearance frightens observers.

name: Plane Shift
shortDesc: Transport creatures to another plane of existence.

name: Possession
shortDesc: Send your mind and soul into another creature's body.

name: Power Word Blind
shortDesc: Utter a word that blinds a creature.

name: Prismatic Spray
shortDesc: Shoot rainbow beams that have various effects on creatures in a cone.

name: Project Image
shortDesc: Make an illusion of yourself you can cast spells through.

name: Regenerate
shortDesc: Cause a creature to heal over time, regrow organs, and reattach body parts.

name: Retrocognition
shortDesc: Sense impressions of past events at your location.

name: Reverse Gravity
shortDesc: Flip the gravitational pull in an area.

name: Spell Turning
shortDesc: Reflect spells back at their caster.

name: Sunburst
shortDesc: A globe of sunlight deals fire damage, hurts undead, and overcomes darkness.

name: Time Beacon
shortDesc: You create a beacon in time, intending to return to it if things go wrong.

name: True Target
shortDesc: Make multiple attacks against a creature especially accurate.

name: Unfettered Pack
shortDesc: Let creatures avoid environmental hindrances.

name: Visions of Danger
shortDesc: Create a vision of horrid, swarming creatures that causes mental damage.

name: Volcanic Eruption
shortDesc: Cause massive lava sprays that burn creatures and encase them in rock.

name: Warp Mind
shortDesc: Confuse a creature, possibly permanently.

name: Antimagic Field
shortDesc: Magic doesn't function in an area around you.

name: Disappearance
shortDesc: Make a creature invisible, silent, and undetectable by any and all senses.

name: Discern Location
shortDesc: Discover a target's exact location within unlimited range.

name: Divine Aura
shortDesc: Allies in an aura have better defenses and are protected against one alignment.

name: Divine Inspiration
shortDesc: Spiritual energy recovers a creature's expended spell.

name: Dream Council
shortDesc: Communicate through a shared dream.

name: Earthquake
shortDesc: Shake the ground with a devastating earthquake.

name: Horrid Wilting
shortDesc: Pull moisture from creatures, damaging them.

name: Maze
shortDesc: Trap a creature in an extradimensional maze.

name: Mind Blank
shortDesc: Protect a creature from mental magic and some divinations.
desc: Powerful wards hide a creature from divination magic. The target gains a +4 status bonus to saves against mental effects. Mind blank attempts to counteract any detection, revelation, and scrying effects as if its spell level were 1 higher than its actual level. On a success, the divination effect functions normally except that it detects nothing about the target and its possessions. For instance, detect magic would still detect other magic in the area, but not any magic on the target.

name: Moment of Renewal
shortDesc: Give a day's recovery in an instant.

name: Monstrosity Form
shortDesc: Turn into a powerful monster.

name: Polar Ray
shortDesc: Bitter cold damages and drains a creature.

name: Power Word Stun
shortDesc: Utter a word that stuns a creature.

name: Prismatic Wall
shortDesc: Form a protective wall with seven chromatic layers.

name: Punishing Winds
shortDesc: A cyclone inhibits fight and traps creatures.

name: Scintillating Pattern
shortDesc: Cause an array of color that dazzles, confuses, and stuns.

name: Spirit Song
shortDesc: Sing an eldritch song that damages any creature that has a spirit.

name: Spiritual Epidemic
shortDesc: Weaken a target with a communicable curse.

name: Uncontrollable Dance
shortDesc: Overcome a target with an all-consuming urge to dance.

name: Unrelenting Observation
shortDesc: You and other creatures use scrying to track a subject exactly.

name: Wind Walk
shortDesc: Turn creatures into swift-moving clouds.

name: Bind Soul
shortDesc: Imprison a dead creature's soul.

name: Crusade
shortDesc: Creatures become dedicated to a cause of your choice.

name: Disjunction
shortDesc: Deactivate or destroy a magic item.

name: Foresight
shortDesc: Sense when a creature is in danger and React to protect it with good fortune.

name: Implosion
shortDesc: Make a creature collapse in on itself.

name: Massacre
shortDesc: Instantly kill multiple creatures.

name: Meteor Swarm
shortDesc: Call down four blazing meteors that explode.

name: Nature's Enmity
shortDesc: Turn animals, plants, and weather against creatures of your choice.

name: Overwhelming Presence
shortDesc: Take on the majesty of a god.

name: Power Word Kill
shortDesc: Utter a word that slays a creature.

name: Prismatic Sphere
shortDesc: Form a protective sphere composed of seven chromatic layers.

name: Resplendent Mansion
shortDesc: Conjure a mansion that lasts for a day.

name: Shapechange
shortDesc: Transform into a form of your choice repeatedly.

name: Storm of Vengeance
shortDesc: Create a massive, dangerous storm.

name: Telepathic Demand
shortDesc: Send a mental message that impels a creature toward a course of action.

name: Unfathomable Song
shortDesc: Song debilitates creatures in weird ways.

name: Wail of the Banshee
shortDesc: Scream, dealing damage and draining creatures.

name: Weapon of Judgement
shortDesc: Form a weapon to enforce war or peace.

name: Weird
shortDesc: Frighten, deal mental damage, and possibly kill large numbers of creatures.

name: Alter Reality
shortDesc: Warp reality to duplicate occult spells.

name: Avatar
shortDesc: Transform into a battle form determined by your deity.

name: Cataclysm
shortDesc: Call an instant, damaging cataclysm.

name: Fabricated Truth
shortDesc: Make creatures believe something is fact.

name: Gate
shortDesc: Tear open a portal to another plane.

name: Miracle
shortDesc: Ask for a blessing to duplicate divine spells.

name: Nature Incarnate
shortDesc: Turn into a massive avatar of nature.

name: Primal Herd
shortDesc: Transform willing creatures into mammoths.

name: Primal Phenomenon
shortDesc: Request for nature to duplicate primal spells.

name: Remake
shortDesc: Recreate a destroyed object.

name: Revival
shortDesc: Heal creatures in an area and return the dead to life temporarily.

name: Time Stop
shortDesc: Briefly stop time for everything but you.

name: Wish
shortDesc: Make a wish to duplicate arcane spells.
